name: Maximum Speed
description:
This little game was made for Trijam #48. The goal was to spend a max of three hours in development, but it took me longer than that, partly because I'm not an artist and decided to do the graphics before implementing the mechanics.

You can move your vehicle up and down via the arrow keys. Avoid the rocks as they slow you down. Instead collect the little power ups that give you a speed up! Collect enough of them and you advance to the next level.

Currently each level is as good as any other, but you have to collect more power ups in each subsequent level.

Made with Godot.
